GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

topics.description: Code is love, code is life

GET /api/users.description: serves an object of each user

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an articles object for article id requested

articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
articles.author: icellusedkars

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an updated article for article id requested with votes property updated

articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
